import QuizData from './Quizz'; const QuizzUI = (props) => { const [question , incorrect_answers , correct_answer] = props.QuizData; const SubmitHandled = ()=>{ alert ("submitted") } return( <>

{props.QuizData.question}

  • {props.incorrect_answers} 1
  • {props.incorrect_answers} 2
  • {props.correct_answer} 3
  • {props.incorrect_answers} 4
) } export default QuizzUI;
